mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.status AS "status", a.type AS "type", a.flow_type AS "flowType", a.theme AS "theme", a.temp AS "temp", a.keyss AS "keyss", a.author AS "author", a.version AS "version", a.flow_id AS "flowId", a.sort AS "sort", a.ui_json AS "uiJson", a.ui_html AS "uiHtml", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", count(b.id) AS "ywsize"

a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.status AS "status", a.type AS "type", a.flow_type AS "flowType", a.theme AS "theme", a.temp AS "temp", a.keyss AS "keyss", a.author AS "author", a.version AS "version", a.flow_id AS "flowId", a.sort AS "sort", a.ui_json AS "uiJson", a.ui_html AS "uiHtml", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
b.id AS "actYws.id", b.rel_id AS "actYws.relId", b.group_id AS "actYws.groupId", b.flow_id AS "actYws.flowId", b.deployment_id AS "actYws.deploymentId", b.is_deploy AS "actYws.isDeploy", b.is_pre_release AS "actYws.isPreRelease", b.is_show_axis AS "actYws.isShowAxis", b.status AS "actYws.status", b.show_time AS "actYws.showTime", b.key_type AS "actYws.keyType"
LEFT JOIN act_yw b ON b.group_id = a.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_yw_group( id, name, status, type, flow_type, theme, temp, keyss, author, version, flow_id, sort, ui_json, ui_html, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{status}, #{type}, #{flowType}, #{theme}, #{temp}, #{keyss}, #{author}, #{version}, #{flowId}, #{sort}, #{uiJson}, #{uiHtml}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE act_yw_group SET name = #{name}, status = #{status}, type = #{type}, flow_type = #{flowType}, theme = #{theme}, temp = #{temp}, keyss = #{keyss}, author = #{author}, version = #{version}, flow_id = #{flowId}, sort = #{sort}, ui_json = #{uiJson}, ui_html = #{uiHtml}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
